title: All Eyes On Luka, Ja, Giannis And Steph
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss this weekend’s game 3s and the impact each game can have. The Heat lead the series 2-0 over the Philadelphia 76ers. Tyrese Maxey has been stepping up in Embiid’s absence but find out which player needs to put up more shots for Philly to win. Luka in the hole down 2-0 to the Suns. CP3 and the Suns are attacking Luka at a high rate. Will the Suns keep up the aggressive game plan to make this series out of reach? Also, no one on the Warriors can stop Ja Morant especially with Gary Payton II out with a broken arm. Will the firepower of the splash brothers show up and take game 3? Also, Shohei Ohtani is making history once again vs the Red Sox. Find out what the superstar is up to now. All that and more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Huge Weekend In The NBA Playoffs, Who Needs To Step Up?
